title: Building Sustainable Communities
abstractText:
The purpose of the seminar is to outline and evaluate the role and impact of private sector businesses in contributing to urban regeneration, with a focus on New Labourâ€™s sustainable communities programme. This is the broad theme of the studentship. The seminar will discuss three areas of debate, of interest both to business and government:

  1. What knowledge do businesses have of urban regeneration plans and policies, and how do such policies and plans influence business plans and behaviour?
  2. What are the motives for business involvement in urban regeneration? How can these be developed and harnessed?
  3. What factors are likely to inhibit or prevent business involvement in sustainable community building?
